introduction: SYNOPSISSoo-ra is adopted to an American family after her mother passes away. Unable to forget the story behind her mother's death, she returns to Korea with a tragic but brave resolution. Soo-ra begins to work for Jeil Electronics which her mother used to run. Knowing that the former vice president of the company, Choi Dal-geun, had her mother killed, she enters the company under a pseudonym. She uses her physical beauty to seduce Choi Dal-geun and puts him under a 3 billion won debt which drives him to suicide. She hurls herself at Jeil's former manager and director to make the former friends fight over her. In the end, one dies and the other lands in jail.故事被美国采纳为失去母亲的孤儿输家。但是不要忘记在母亲去世交织的故事，她终于回来了韩国与脾的分辨率。Su的副总裁Choi杀死了他的母亲，盗走了他的身份并偷走了第一电子。苏有一张美丽的面孔和血腥的肉体，诱使崔某得到30亿的破产和自杀。老总和总经理，谁也掌管着这些标语牌，将会发起进攻，并且会有两个朋友在拼命的生活。突然之间，两个变成苏拉的人进行了决斗。最终，一个人死亡，一个人连锁。
